properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:29AM CST until January 18 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...Hale
and Marengo Counties.

.Heavy rainfall during the past 48 hours and additional rainfall
forecast during the next 48 hours will produce rises along the
lower Black Warrior River...and a flood warning is now in effect for
the Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* from Wednesday afternoon to Saturday morning...or until the Warning
is cancelled.
* At 8:15 AM Monday The stage Was 86.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Wednesday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 91.5 feet by Thursday evening. The river
will fall below flood stage by Friday night.
* Impact...At 90 feet...Pasture and wood lands begin to flood.
Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
